EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Greenplum Summit_NYC_Q119.GP Summit Post Event Email - 3/27/19
EmailTemplate.subject: Greenplum Summit Presentations & Resources Now Online
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for connecting with us at PostgresConf! Whether you attended Greenplum Summit sessions or had a chat with our team in the Pivotal booth, we trust you now know a little (or a lot!) more about Greenplum Database and how it delivers massively parallel Postgres for analytics and AI workloads.
Want to learn even more?
- Review the Greenplum Summit Presentations <[[https://content.pivotal.io/greenplum-summit-2019?utm_campaign=event_gpsummit_email_q119&utm_source=nurture-email&utm_medium=email]]> - The sessions cover a breadth of topics from exciting customer use cases to advanced data science and beyond. - Check out our Library of Resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum?utm_campaign=event_gpsummit_email_q119&utm_source=nurture-email&utm_medium=email]]> - Peruse our videos, white papers, and tutorials to learn about all things Greenplum. - Learn the Greenplum Basics <[[https://greenplum.org/greenplum-101/]]> - If you are new to Greenplum, you can review our Greenplum 101 materials to get started. - Download Greenplum today <[[https://greenplum.org/download/]]> or check it out in your favorite cloud marketplace and start leveraging powerful, rapid analytics on petabyte-scale data volumes.
Letâ€™s Stay Connected! Continue the conversation with #ScaleMatters <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/ScaleMatters?src=hash]]> on Twitter, follow @PivotalData <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalData]]> and @Greenplum <[[https://twitter.com/Greenplum]]> for the latest news, and join the Greenplum Community <[[https://greenplum.org/]]> to be the first to know about new features and updates.
Best Regards, The Pivotal Team
